Package de.fourofakind.businesshotel.employees

Class Employee

java.lang.Object
de.fourofakind.businesshotel.employees.Employee
public class Employee
extends java.lang.Object
This is the main actor in our application for now. It maintains Bookings and Rooms and interacts with Customers. Employees can acquire several roles and there fore inherit rights to do different tasks each. Later there will be different employee specializations for different jobs inside the company using the software.

  • Method Details

    • createBooking

      public Booking createBooking​(int roomNo, int customerID, TimeFrame timeFrame, DateFrame dateFrame, Booking.BookingType bookingType, Room.Category roomCategory, java.lang.String specialWishes, boolean isBusinessCustomer) throws java.lang.IllegalCallerException

      Implementation of the Employee's ability to create Bookings for Customers uses getEmpNo to automatically add the employee's number and always the current date to ensure the right date is stored to bookingDate. Role BookingManager is needed.

      Parameters:
      roomNo - Number of the Room which is used as well as its position inside Rooms
      timeFrame - the time span in which the corresponding room will be used; should contain fixed time spans for hotel rooms and variable time spans for conference rooms
      dateFrame - the date span for one or multiple days, of which a room is blocked; should allow variable date spans for both types of rooms as a conference room could be used for a congress for multiple days and a hotel room can be used for one or multiple nights
      bookingType - indicates if the booking is a HotelRoomBooking or a ConferenceRoomBooking
      roomCategory - Description of the time of room, should be Suite, Single Room or Double Room for hotel rooms or Little Group or Big Group for conference rooms
      specialWishes - contains any special wishes made by a customer, could be an extra bed, room service or wake up service in the morning
      isBusinessCustomer - marks the booking to be requested by a business customer or for personal use; important for generation of bills and taxes to be used
      Returns:
      the Booking created just now
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalCallerException - if the employee does not inherit the role BookingManager

    • changeBooking

      public boolean changeBooking​(int bookingNo, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> toBeChangedAttributes, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> changedValues) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.IllegalCallerException

      Implementation of the Employee's ability to change one or multiple attributes of a Booking same params as createBooking, but some can be null-like values, if they should not be changed. Role BookingManager is needed.

      Parameters:
      bookingNo - Number of the Booking as well as its position inside Bookings
      toBeChangedAttributes - contains all attributes named by string, that need to be changed inside the Booking object
      changedValues - contains all values for the attributes named in toBeChangedAttributes, which need to be casted to the right datatype before setting them in the Booking object
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the amount of arguments is too few for the amount of values to be changed
      java.lang.IllegalCallerException - if the employee does not inherit the role BookingManager

    • deleteBooking

      public void deleteBooking​(int bookingNo) throws java.lang.IllegalCallerException

      Implementation of the Employee's ability to delete a Booking by its booking number does not use the remove method of the ArrayList to keep the relation of the position of a booking in Bookings to its bookingNo. Role BookingManager is needed.

      Parameters:
      bookingNo - Number of the Booking as well as its position inside Bookings
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalCallerException - if the employee does not inherit the role BookingManager

    • changeRoomDetails

      public boolean changeRoomDetails​(int roomNo, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> toBeChangedAttributes, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> changedValues) throws java.lang.IllegalCallerException

      Implementation of the Employee's ability to change attributes of a room to save details of real world changes to the room does not change the number of a room or its use case (hotel room or conference room). Role RoomAdministrator is needed.

      Parameters:
      roomNo - Number of the room which is to be changed; provides the index of the room inside Rooms
      toBeChangedAttributes - contains all values named by string, that need to be changed
      changedValues - contains all changed Values, needs to be casted to the right datatype
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalCallerException - if the employee does not inherit the role RoomAdministrator

    • createConferenceRoom

      public ConferenceRoom createConferenceRoom​(int roomNo, Room.Category category, int areaInSqrMetre, int maxAmountOfParticipants, int amountOfWhiteboards, int amountOfBeamer, boolean hasScreen, boolean hasComputer, boolean hasTV, float pricePerUnit) throws java.lang.IllegalCallerException

      Implementation of the Employee's ability to create a conference room. Creates a new room according to the given details and adds it to the roomList. Role RoomAdministrator is needed.

      Parameters:
      roomNo - Number of the room, that is created according to real world; index of the rumber in Rooms
      category - category of the room, depending on if it is a hotel room (suite, single room, double room) or conference room (big group, small group)
      areaInSqrMetre - area of the room in square metres
      maxAmountOfParticipants - maximal amount of people allowed in the room according to current corona guidelines, later depending on amount of seats
      amountOfWhiteboards - tells how many Whiteboards are in the room
      amountOfBeamer - tells how many beamers are in the room
      hasScreen - tells whether there is a screen for the presentation of data
      hasComputer - tells whether there is a computer in the room
      hasTV - tells whether there is a TV in the room
      Returns:
      ConferenceRoom created
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalCallerException - if the employee does not inherit the role RoomAdministrator

    • createHotelRoom

      public HotelRoom createHotelRoom​(int roomNo, Room.Category category, int areaInSqrMetre, int bedCount, boolean hasSpeedLAN, boolean hasTV, boolean hasKitchen, boolean hasCoffeemaker, float pricePerUnit) throws java.lang.IllegalCallerException

      Implementation of the Employee's ability to create a hotel room. Creates a new room according to the given details and adds it to the roomList. Role RoomAdministrator is needed.

      Parameters:
      roomNo - Number of the room, that is created according to real world; index of the rumber in Rooms
      category - category of the room, depending on if it is a hotel room (suite, single room, double room) or conference room (big group, small group)
      areaInSqrMetre - area of the room in square metres
      bedCount - amount of beds in the hotel room
      hasSpeedLAN - tells if the room has a SpeedLan Connection avaiable
      hasTV - tells if the room has a TV
      hasKitchen - tells if there is a kitchen to cook in the room
      hasCoffeemaker - tells if there is a Coffeemaker in the room
      Returns:
      HotelRoom created
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalCallerException - if the employee does not inherit the role RoomAdministrator

    • deleteRoom

      public void deleteRoom​(int roomNo) throws java.lang.IllegalCallerException

      Implementation of the Employee's ability to delete a room entirely. Ensures that unsuable rooms are deleted from the Rooms and can not be used for bookings. Reasons could be a fusion of two or multiple rooms or the purpose of a room has changed entirely. Role RoomAdministrator is needed.

      Parameters:
      roomNo - number of the room to be deleted
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalCallerException - if the employee does not inherit the role RoomAdministrator

    • findBooking

      public java.util.ArrayList<Booking> findBooking​(int BookingNo, int RoomNo, int empNo, DateFrame dateFrame, TimeFrame timeFrame, java.lang.String bookingDate, Room.Category roomCategory)

      Implementation of the Employee's ability to search for a booking by several parameters given. Will later be much more efficient if based on database actions. It is possible to search only by EmpNo to determine an Employee's work rate, to search only by bookingNo, which should always return only one booking and to search by a RoomNo and a dateframe and a timeframe, when the room should be used. In the last case there are used even further defined parameters like bookingDate or roomCategory, but only if given. Not all Parameters have to be set to use the function, not known information should be given with "null" or 0, depending on the data type.

      Parameters:
      BookingNo - number of the booking to be searched for as well as its position in Bookings
      RoomNo - number of the room which is documented in the booking to be searched for
      empNo - number of the employee that created the booking to be searched for
      dateFrame - dateframe of the booking to be searched for
      timeFrame - timeframe of the booking to be searched for
      bookingDate - date of the booking to be searched for
      roomCategory - category of the room which is documented in the booking to be searched for
      Returns:
      all resulting Booking that match the search criteria

    • showAllBookings

      public java.lang.StringBuilder showAllBookings()

      The implementation of a Listing feature, to analyze all Bookings. For now the function does not need any arguments, later it will be further developed to change the given view by several aspects needed

      Returns:
      all Bookings inside Bookings

    • manageBookingRequests

      public void manageBookingRequests() throws java.lang.IllegalCallerException, java.util.NoSuchElementException

      The implementation of an autonomous management of customer requests, based on whether or not a suitable room is free at the time given.

      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalCallerException - in case of someone using the function without the BookingsManager Role and its inherited Rights to manage bookings
      java.util.NoSuchElementException - if there is no room of the wanted category at all

    • createCustomer

      public Customer createCustomer​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String streetName, java.lang.String streetNumber, java.lang.String postalCode, java.lang.String cityName, java.lang.String mailAddress, Customer.paymentMethods paymentMethod, java.lang.String iban) throws java.lang.IllegalCallerException

      The implementation of the Employee's ability to create a customer by given parameters. The customer will be added to an ArrayList

      Parameters:
      firstName - first name of the customer
      lastName - last name of the customer
      streetName - name of street where the customer lives
      streetNumber - street number of the customer
      postalCode - postalcode of the customer
      cityName - name of the city where the customer lives
      mailAddress - selected emailaddress by the customer for contact
      paymentMethod - selected paymentmethod of the customer
      iban - optional paymentDataCredentials of the customer
      Returns:
      Customer created
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalCallerException - in case of someone using the function without the CustomerRelationshipManager Role and its inherited rights to manage customers

    • changeCustomer

      public boolean changeCustomer​(int customerID, java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value) throws java.lang.IllegalCallerException

      The implementation of the Employee's ability to change a customer by given customerID and key and value of the new customers property.

      Parameters:
      customerID - id to find the target customer in customers ArrayList
      key - key of the property to be changed
      value - new value of the property to be changed
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalCallerException - in case of someone using the function without the CustomerRelationshipManager Role and its inherited rights to manage customers

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer​(int customerID) throws java.lang.IllegalCallerException

      The implementation of the Employee's ability to delete a customer from customers ArrayList by given customerID.

      Parameters:
      customerID - id to select the customer to be deleted
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalCallerException - in case of someone using the function without the CustomerRelationshipManager Role and its inherited rights to manage customers
